<Text: The 1970 South African Grand Prix, formally titled the Fourth AA Grand Prix of South Africa (Afrikaans: "Vierde AA Suid-Afrikaanse Grand Prix"), was a Formula One motor race held at Kyalami Circuit on 7 March 1970.>
